title: Boundary Expansion Strategies in Blended Learning Environments: Application to Mathematics Practice

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Mathematical Knowledge and Experience Applying Mathematics to Job-Related Tasks
context.additional_context: Blended learning environment for current practitioners via smartphones, incorporating formative assessments for continuous feedback

learning_goals: Learners can analyze intra- and inter-group knowledge-sharing networks with 80% accuracy using Social Network Analysis (SNA)-based tools.
Learners can improve job problem-solving efficiency by 30% by designing cross-border collaboration strategies in blended learning environments.
Learners can diagnose individual/team learning performance patterns based on formative assessment data and suggest improvement plans.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
